Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if it's ever been suggested before but i'd like some stock kerbal parachutes to be added so if something goes wrong on kerbin and you need to EVA in high speeds then your kerbals won't be instantly turned into pancakes.

I know theres a mod but it didn't work every time i tried so i'd like to see stock parachutes for kerbals.
This would make me very happy as well.
Guys, please remember to check the What Not to Suggest List before posting. Parachutes for Kerbals have been suggested many, many times, and are right here on the WNTS list.

Guys, please remember to check the What Not to Suggest List before posting. Parachutes for Kerbals have been suggested many, many times, and are right here on the WNTS list.

Thank you for noticing, but reporting this and letting the moderators do the moderators' job is more appreciated

That being said, locked.
